attributes.action: A Vote of Confidence by the UK in Jeremy Corbyn's Leadership of the Labour Party
attributes.background: There is a coup from within & outside of the Labour Party, to undermine Jeremy Corbyn's leadership. This man is THE most principled man in Westminster. Those that seek to oust him, do so, to take the power away from the workers of Our Proud Country. Show them that we WILL NOT stand for this!

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
